settings.title: Fasting for Weight Loss
settings.description: Reset bad habits and transform your body through fasting
Decrease excess body fat & preserve lean body mass.
Maintain healthy systolic blood pressure and metabolic balance.
Get results in just 5 days! Take 5 for better health.

settings.title:
For those turning to fasting for weight loss, the results are often quick and rewarding.


When it comes to losing weight, there’s no shortage of diets to choose from. Most approaches target specific foods to either add or eliminate from your diet. But rather than focus on what to eat, more people are discovering the weight loss and health benefits brought about by when they eat. For those turning to fasting for weight loss, the results are often quick and rewarding.


Depending on the type of fast performed, results will vary, and maintaining the desired weight loss over time can be a challenge. However you can begin to see fasting benefits in as little as 5 days with the ProLon® Fasting Mimicking Diet®.  The Fasting Mimicking Diet allows you to keep you body in a fasting state while nourishing your body with macro and micro nutritent food and tea

"You’ll arrive at a place where you say no to the cheesecake because you don’t want it, not because you are denying yourself a treat.”

~ Michael Mosley
Delicious, pre portioned meals, snacks, & tea so you can successfully fast with food™.
settings.description:
Get many of the benefits of a 5-day fast without giving up food with ProLon, the first and only patented 5-Day Fasting Mimicking Diet. ProLon gently guides your body into a fasting state to get many of the health benefits that come from longer fasts while enjoying delicious meals and tasty snacks including: 


A variety of 5 different soup flavors, Kale crackers, Chocolate dessert bar, Olives, L-drink for energy, & Supplements.


Fat Focused Weight Loss*– Fast way to lose fat (especially belly fat) while protecting lean body mass.
settings.tag: HASSLE FREE CONVENIENCE FOR ANY LIFESTYLE

settings.title: 5 Days to Weight Loss!
settings.description:
To achieve significant and lasting weight loss, a prolonged fast extending beyond two days is often the best option due to its ability to help maintain weight loss without slowing metabolism. One particular fasting approach that fits within this category is the ProLon® Fasting Mimicking Diet® (FMD®)

While the Fasting Mimicking Diet restricts calories similar to other intermittent fasts, it does so by using foods that deliver a very specific blend of micro and macronutrients that trick the body into thinking it is fasting. Furthermore, because you’re nourishing your body while it’s operating in fasting mode, you’re actually able to maintain lean body mass, which could normally be lost during a traditional prolonged fast.

settings.html:
What is your 5 day healthier you goal?


In just 5 days, you will experience the amazing weight loss and other health benefits of fasting without having to skip a meal. Then with the Fast Bar, you can maintain those goals until your next round of ProLon. It all leads to a leaner, better performing version of yourself. What’s more, the 5-Day Fasting Mimicking Diet is not nearly as difficult to implement into your lifestyle as other types of prolonged fasts, since it enables you to eat food while you fast. To learn more and see how the FMD presents the perfect path to fasting for weight loss, click here.




*Individual results will vary. ProLon is a very low calorie 5-day Fasting Mimicking Diet. In a clinical study, ProLon® is shown over three cycles to help individuals lose an average of 5.7 lbs and 1.6 inches off their waist circumference.
ProLon is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any diseases and has not been evaluated as such by the FDA.
